nodal_department: Women and Child Development Department, Puducherry
brief_description: The Government of Puducherry introduced Old Age And Destitute Pension Scheme to extend a helping hand by way of monthly financial assistance to Old Age Persons/Widows/ Deserted Women/ Unmarried Women and Enuches so that they could defray some petty personal expenses without depending on others.
detailed_description: The Government of Puducherry introduced Old Age And Destitute Pension Scheme to extend a helping hand by way of monthly financial assistance to Old Age Persons/Widows/ Deserted Women/ Unmarried Women and Enuches so that they could defray some petty personal expenses without depending on others. > Amount of assistance - ₹1500/- per month for Old Age Persons, Destitute women, Widows, and Transgender with age less than 60 years. - ₹2000/- per month for Old Age Persons, Destitute women, Widows, and Transgender with age between 60 years and 79 years. - ₹3000/- per month for Old Age Persons, Destitute women, Widows, and Transgender with age 80 years and above.
benefits: ₹1500/- per month for Old Age Persons, Destitute women, Widows, and Transgender with age less than 60 years. ₹2000/- per month for Old Age Persons, Destitute women, Widows, and Transgender with age between 60 years and 79 years. ₹3000/- per month for Old Age Persons, Destitute women, Widows, and Transgender with age 80 years and above.
eligibility_criteria: Old Age both men and Women above fifty-five years. Widows above 18 years of age. Deserted Women consecutively deserted for the past seven years. Unmarried Women above 40 years. Transgender above 21 years.

steps: Puducherry: The Deputy Director (Social Defence), Old Age Pension Section, Department of Women and Child Development, Puducherry. Karaikal: The Child Development Project Officer, Karaikal. Mahe/Yanam: The Welfare Officer, Mahe/ Yanam.
The selection is periodical and depends on the vacancies and on the availability of funds.
In case of delay whom to contact?
Puducherry: The Director, Department of Women and Child Development, Sithankudi, Puducherry. Karaikal: The Collector, Karaikal. Mahe/Yanam: The Regional Administrator, Mahe/Yanam.

documents_required: Identification certificate. Income certificate ( Not Exceeding ₹75,000/-). Residence certificate. Attested copy of Birth Certificate or documentary proof of age. Attested copy of Ration Card/Identity Card. Attested copy of Aadhaar and Bank Pass Book. Attested copy of the Death Certificate of the husband in case of Widow. In the case of deserted Women, a Certificate from the M.L.A. and Anganwadi Worker, that the individual has been deserted for seven years consecutively and a sworn affidavit in Appendix I. In the case of unmarried Women, and a sworn affidavit in Appendix II. In the Transgender, proof of being 40 years and above and a Medical Certificate from a Medical Officer.
